title: Convert to PWA and change application name

requirements.text: Configure the application as a Progressive Web App (PWA) by adding a web app manifest file with appropriate metadata including app name, description, icons, theme colors, display mode set to 'standalone', and start URL
acceptanceCriteria: A manifest.json file exists in frontend/public with proper PWA configuration
Manifest includes app name, short_name, description, theme_color, background_color, display: 'standalone', and start_url
Manifest is linked in index.html with appropriate meta tags

requirements.text: Implement a service worker for PWA functionality to enable offline capability, caching strategies, and installation prompts
acceptanceCriteria: Service worker file is created and registered in the application
Basic caching strategy is implemented for static assets
Application can be installed to device home screen
Install prompt appears on supported browsers

requirements.text: Generate PWA icon assets in multiple sizes (192x192, 512x512) for the room rental application with a home/room themed design
acceptanceCriteria: Icon files are generated and placed in frontend/public/assets/generated
Icons are referenced in the manifest.json
Icons display correctly when app is installed to home screen

requirements.text: Update the application name throughout the codebase based on user's preference (ask user for the new desired name)

quotes: mujhe iska name change karna hai

acceptanceCriteria: Application name is updated in index.html title tag
Application name is updated in PWA manifest
Application name is updated in Navigation component
All user-facing references to the app name are consistent

constraints: Preserve existing warm visual theme with earthy tones
Maintain existing routing and page structure
Do not modify backend actor logic
nonGoals: Adding offline data synchronization for user-generated content

required: PWA app icon with home/room rental theme, warm earthy color palette matching the app design (pwa-icon-192.dim_192x192.png)
PWA app icon with home/room rental theme, warm earthy color palette matching the app design, larger variant (pwa-icon-512.dim_512x512.png)
